lemma diagonal_imp_submatrix_element_not0: assumes dA: "diagonal_mat A" and A_carrier: "A \<in> carrier_mat n m" and Ik: "card I = k" and Jk: "card J = k" and I: "I \<subseteq> {0..<n}" and J: "J \<subseteq> {0..<m}" and b: "b < k" and ex_not0: "\<exists>i. i<k \<and> submatrix A I J $$ (i, b) \<noteq> 0" shows "\<exists>!i. i<k \<and> submatrix A I J $$ (i, b) \<noteq> 0"
